meanings.definition: The quality or state of being kinky.
meanings.sent1: Her kinkinesses added excitement to the party.
meanings.sent2: The kinkinesses of her hair made it unique.
meanings.sent3: The kinkinesses of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His kinkinesses in fashion always turned heads.
meanings.sent5: The kinkinesses of his personality shone through in his artwork.

meanings.definition: The presence of kinks or twists in something.
meanings.sent1: The kinkinesses in the wire caused it to tangle easily.
meanings.sent2: She carefully ironed out the kinkinesses in the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The kinkinesses in the road made driving challenging.
meanings.sent4: The kinkinesses in the rope made it difficult to untangle.
meanings.sent5: The kinkinesses in the plot kept the audience engaged.

meanings.definition: The tendency to engage in unconventional or unconventional sexual behavior.
meanings.sent1: His kinkinesses led him to explore new experiences.
meanings.sent2: The couple's kinkinesses kept their relationship exciting.
meanings.sent3: The kinkinesses of their date night surprised their friends.
meanings.sent4: Her kinkinesses in the bedroom were well-known among her partners.
meanings.sent5: The kinkinesses of their fantasies knew no bounds.
